content:
# EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Copper plate mine at position(41.0, -82.0)
Consists of following entities
-  Burner mining drill (position x=41.0 y=-82.0) and a stone furnace at position(x=41.0 y=-80.0)
-  Burner mining drill (no other mining drills found) and a stone furnace at position(x=60.0 y=-60.0)

### Electricity generator at position(106.5, -32.5)
Consists of 
-  Offshore pump (position x=106.5 y=-32.5)
-  Boiler (position x=111.5 y=-32.0)
-  Steam engine (position x=117.5 y=-30.5)

### Transport system at position(63.5, -53.5)
Consists of 
-  Transport belt (position x=63.5 y=-53.5)
-  Transport belt (position x=64.5 y=-53.5)

# ERROR TIPS
### Errors when using burner entities but being out of fuel
-  Make sure to fuel the burner entities before using them
### Errors when using steam engine but not being connected to a power source
-  Ensure the steam engine is connected to a power source before using it
### Errors when using entities that require ingredients but having none
-  Make sure to provide the necessary ingredients for the entities to function
### Errors when using entities that require to be plugged into an electric network but not being plugged in
-  Ensure the entities are plugged into an electric network before using them
### Errors when using pipe groups but being empty
-  Make sure to fill the pipe groups with the necessary fluids before using them

# NAMESPACE
No utility functions have been defined by the agent. 
No important variables have been assigned.
